title: 12/07/21 DPs Best Of
itunes:title: 12/07/21 DPs Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to Chris Simms about last night’s game. Was it a genius gameplan by Bill Belichick. We try to get to the bottom of Carson Palmer’s missing Heisman key. And Kirk Herbstreit handicaps this year’s Heisman Trophy race.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
